name: But there is a Twister Outside!
name_original: But there is a Twister Outside!
description:
"I can't go to work today"

*angry shouting*

"...but there is a twister outside!"

*very angry shouting*

"Alright."

Control with WASD.  Pick up trash (white cubes) with E  . Run with Shift.

Pick up the trash (and put them in the trashcan (the ugly grey block in the center).

Get as much trash as you can in 60 seconds.

Flying debris like cars and trees don't do damage - don't worry :)

Game created in 3 hours for Trijam 154 - But there is a twist..

Playing around with 3D-Arcade games. This one - not so great.

Tools used:

Unity

1BitDragon

Assets used:

Tornado Particles:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/spells/particle-ribbon-42866

Street:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/small-town-america-streets-free-59759
